package sample.java;

import java.lang.reflect.Array;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.Arrays;
import java.util.Iterator;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class Student {
	int id, mobileno;
	static String address;
	public Student(int id, int mobileno, String address) {
		this.id=id;
		this.mobileno=mobileno;
		this.address=address;
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	}
	  public String toString() 
	  { 
		  return id + " " + mobileno + " " + address + " ";
	  }
	 public static void main(String[] args) {
		int n;
		ArrayList<Student> arlist= new ArrayList<Student>();
		ArrayList<Student> arlist1= new ArrayList<Student>();
		ArrayList<String> list = new ArrayList<>(2);
		while(true) {
		Scanner s = new Scanner(System.in);
		System.out.println("Available Arry list value"+arlist);
		System.out.println("1-Insert student\n2-Search student\n3-Delete student\n4-Print all Student details\n5-Exit");
		System.out.println("Enter your choice");
		n = s.nextInt();
		Student st = new Student(n, n, address);
		switch (n) {
		case 1:
			//System.out.println(n);
			System.out.println("Please Enter no of student you want to enter");
			int x = s.nextInt();
			System.out.println("Enter Students id,mobileno,address");
			System.out.println("Available Arry list value"+arlist);
			for (int i = 0; i < x; i++) {
				st.id = s.nextInt();
				st.mobileno = s.nextInt();
				st.address = s.next();
				Student student = new Student(st.id, st.mobileno, st.address);
				arlist.add(student);
			    System.out.println(student.toString());
			}
			break;
		case 2:
			System.out.println("Available Arry list value"+arlist+"\n");
			System.out.println(arlist.size());
			System.out.println("Enter the student id that you are looking for ");
			int a,y=s.nextInt();
			System.out.println("String = "+y);
			Iterator<Student> itr=arlist.iterator();
			n=0;
			while(itr.hasNext())
			 {
				a=(st.id=y);
				System.out.println(a);
				System.out.println(arlist.contains("s"));
				boolean ans=arlist.contains(y);
				System.out.println(ans);
				if(ans)
				System.out.println(st.id+" "+st.mobileno+""+st.address);
				if(n>=(arlist.size()))
				{
					break;
			 }n++;
			break;
				}
		case 3:
			System.out.println("Available Arry list value"+arlist+"\n");
			System.out.println(arlist.size());
			System.out.println("Enter the student id that you want to remove ");
			int b,z=s.nextInt();
			System.out.println("String = "+z);
			Iterator<Student> itr1=arlist.iterator();
			n=0;
			while(itr1.hasNext())
			 {
				a=(st.id=z);
				System.out.println(a);
				System.out.println(arlist.contains("s"));
				boolean ans=arlist.contains(z);
				System.out.println(ans);
				if(ans)
				System.out.println(st.id+" "+st.mobileno+""+st.address);
				if(n>=(arlist.size()))
				{
					break;
			 }n++;
			break;
				}
		case 4:
			if(arlist.size()!=0)
				System.out.println("Available Arry list value"+arlist+"\n");
				
			else
				System.out.println("No list to display");
				
			/*int t=1;
			list.add("A");
		        list.add("B");
		        list.add("C");
		        list.add("D");
		        System.out.println("Enter the student id that you are looking for ");
				String e=s.next();
		        System.out.println( list.contains("A") );       //true
		        System.out.println( list.contains(e) );       //false*/
		case 5:
			System.exit(0);
		}
		}
				
	}
}
